channel.title: Ds Education on Bayesian Politics
channel.description: Recent content in Ds Education on Bayesian Politics

item.title: Dancing the K-Means Dance
item.description: Dancing can be traced back to the origins of almost every society in the world. It is a way to communicate ideas and feelings in a free manner. It also is a simple, memorable and effective way to communicate from kids to seniors. We wondered whether we could use dance to facilitate student learning and retention of a Machine Learning algorithm in an introductory data science course.
